registerFirst: You need to register your equipement first
instructions.1: Activate the QR code to open the application
instructions.2: Unlock the door via the application
instructions.3: Place your board/skis inside the machine, base facing you, as shown
instructions.4: Start waxing with the button below
instructions.5: Wait 5 min, pick up your equipment, and have fun!
pickUp.1: The door is unlocked, you can open it and pick up your equipment.
thanks: Thank you for using the Waxmachine!
feedback: Now please fill the feedback form to tell us more about your experience and what we can improve.
instructionsRegister: You must enter an email and a password to create the account
instructionsEquipment: You must register your equipment before waxing
instructions.6: Open the door until you reach the stopper
